task: Plan a surprise multi-destination luxury anniversary celebration. The event will span three countries over two weeks. Arrange private jet transport, luxury accommodation, gourmet dining reservations, personalized tours in each location, and private performances. Nutritional and health preferences must be respected. Engage a private photographer and videographer to document the trip. Include a health check-up before and after the trip, with all travel aligning with health guidelines.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level client agent that orchestrates the planning and execution of the luxury anniversary celebration.

agents.name: transportation_agent
agents.role: Handles all transport arrangements, including securing private jets and managing flight logistics.

agents.name: accommodation_agent
agents.role: Manages bookings for luxury accommodations and customizes the suite experiences.

agents.name: dining_experience_agent
agents.role: Arranges gourmet dining experiences tailored to personal preferences.

agents.name: tour_organizer_agent
agents.role: Plans tailored tours including adventure and cultural experiences.

agents.name: entertainment_agent
agents.role: Arranges private performances, concerts, or shows during the trip.

agents.name: media_documentation_agent
agents.role: Coordinates photography and videography services to document the event.

agents.name: health_management_agent
agents.role: Ensures health checks and vaccination compliance before and after the trip, aligning with health guidelines.

agents.name: private_jet_agent
agents.role: Sources and secures private jet transport for the event.

agents.name: luxury_hotel_booking_agent
agents.role: Books luxury hotels and manages guest readiness prior to arrival.

agents.name: gourmet_reservation_agent
agents.role: Makes gourmet dining reservations and customizes menu choices.

agents.name: local_adventure_agent
agents.role: Arranges local adventurous tours tailored to the travelers' interests.

agents.name: performance_scheduler_agent
agents.role: Schedules performances and recruits artists while handling legal contracts.

agents.name: photography_services_agent
agents.role: Organizes photography sessions and coordinates content delivery.

agents.name: videography_services_agent
agents.role: Conducts videography sessions and coordinates the production of video content.

agents.name: pre_trip_medical_check_agent
agents.role: Coordinates pre-trip medical checks and vaccination requirements.

agents.name: suite_customization_agent
agents.role: Customizes hotel suites as per guest preferences.

agents.name: guest_preparation_agent
agents.role: Prepares rooms with personalized amenities and requests.

agents.name: pilot_coordination_agent
agents.role: Manages pilot scheduling and ensures adherence to schedules.

agents.name: dietary_preference_agent
agents.role: Ensures all meals adhere to dietary restrictions and preferences.

agents.name: cultural_experience_agent
agents.role: Organizes cultural events and offerings in each location.

agents.name: artist_recruitment_agent
agents.role: Recruits artists for private performances and manages contracts.

agents.name: content_delivery_agent
agents.role: Delivers media content through secure channels post-documentation.

agents.name: vaccination_standard_agent
agents.role: Verifies and ensures vaccination standards meet international travel requirements.

agents.name: language_translator_agent
agents.role: Provides translation services to enhance the travel experience.

agents.name: legal_contracts_agent
agents.role: Reviews and handles all legal contracts involved in the performances.

agents.name: flight_permission_agent
agents.role: Secures necessary airspace clearances and permissions for private jet flights.

agents.name: post_trip_health_check_agent
agents.role: Arranges and conducts health check-ups after the trip to ensure wellbeing and guideline adherence.

tools.name: menu_customization_agent
tools.description: Customizes menus for gourmet dining experiences, considering dietary restrictions.

cuisine_type.description: Preferred type of cuisine for dining

dietary_restrictions.description: List of dietary restrictions that need to be accommodated

tools.name: legal_contracts_agent
tools.description: Handles legal contract creation and review for entertainment services.

participant_names.description: List of names of all parties involved

agreement_details.description: Detailed terms and conditions of the contract
